RoboTime

This game is a rogue-like platformer. Your goal is to progress through as many levels as possible before the timer runs out.

Game and Rules

To progress through levels you must jump your way through a randomly generated level to the also randomly-placed exit. On your way you can pick up small clocks that give you a little bit of extra time. You can do double jumps and wall jumps for maximum freedom of movement.

Development process

This is game that I am especially proud off, because it was just myself doing all the work on it. I love platformers and I love game feel, so imagine my joy when I got an assignment to make a vertical-jumping game that focused on game feel and "juice". To have more autonomy I decided to work alone in the two weeks we had to make this game.

I learned a lot while making this game. First off, making a really powerful sound and screen-shake effect for a tiny cute robot, doesn't really fit together. Secondl, While I didn't have enough time to actually do it, this game would have been improved tremendously if the levels had a better random-generation algorithm. This would make the game much less random, and much easier to become good at.

  • Date:
    13/11/17
  • Engine:
    Unity
  • Role on team:
    Programmer and designer
  • Team size:
    Just me
  • Time given:
    Two weeks
